resources.string: You find yourself in a small village, the only way out is going back.\n\n It look\'s nice, might want to check it out before heading back.
Hello there! Good that you came, I have a question for you, which color do you like best?
You see a lot of books about Pokemon. One catches your eye and you grab it from its place. \'Pokenatomy\', the cover reads. Better put it back.
You\'d rather not open that book again, you saw too much of Chansey already.
Hey there! My parents aren\'t home but they work at the Lab, I sometimes visit them!
Don\'t go out! It\'s unsafe! Wild Pokémon live in tall grass! You need your own Pokémon for your protection.\n\n Meet me at my lab.
You look around and see a beautiful forest, what was that old man on about? Pikachu\'s frolicking about everywhere! \n\nThere\'s a sign in front of you
You can see an island in the distance.\n\nToo bad you don\'t have any big water Pokemon.
